name: Super Panda Feel
description:
Basically just eliminate all the enemies. How do you do that? By jumping around and firing lasers out of your butthole of course...

-You have limited ammo, and can reload only by landing on the ground.

-Dead enemies leave ghosts, which can be collected for additional points.

-Shoot multiple enemies without touching the ground to start a combo. Build up a combo then touch the ground to instantly kill all enemies on screen.

-Pretty Kool Music
